name: Zombie war watch: Dead survive
description:
The horror of zombies has now followed you everywhere right on your watch. Shoot them, blast them, rip them off... do what it take to survive!!!

Zombie war can be played on watch, phone or tablet. All with same incredible pixel graphics and retro sounds. Fear not to get the game now (if you dare to)!!!

---------------------------------

- minigun by 6666
Released under CC-0
- flame by: Pixel Flame Animation 2 by Michael J Pierce
- sound effect: Bart
- Fonts was built with FontStruct, based on Thirteen Pixel Fonts by 30100flo
- Music by: Ibrahim

--------------------------------

We Cakeogame studio update games regularly. Please comment things you'd like to see in reviews.
